channel.title: [PI]How would I change the options an item gives[PI]Help Needed Please
channel.description: Okay title says some of it, i have at the moment a ring of kingship that when i click teleport to daemonheim it teleports me to my coords like this down below - thats perfect, now its just how would i go about changing the options like there are seven - open party interface, wear, teleport to daemonheim etc. how would i change the last few???? i have put quite alot of effort into getting this pic so please help. [img]http://images.wikia.com/runescape/images/2/21/Ring-of-kinship-teleport.gif[/img]

item.title: [PI]How would I change the options an item gives[PI]Help Needed Please
item.dc:creator: @ZioBotic ZioBotic
item.description:
